snippet: A straightforward spot demonstrating the capacity of a French-door refrigerator from Samsung received the highest score for any of the almost 6,000 commercials that Ace Metrix evaluated last year.
abstract: A straightforward spot demonstrating the capacity of a French-door refrigerator from Samsung received the highest score for any of the almost 6,000 commercials that Ace Metrix evaluated last year.

headline.main: Top Commercial for 2012 Was Really 'Big,' Ace Metrix Says
